error.modulo: select T1.JOURNALNUMBER, T1.RECID, T1.Zap_CreatedTime, T3.DISPLAYVALUE, T3.MAINACCOUNTVALUE, T3.SUCURSALVALUE, T3.FILIAL_TERCEROVALUE, T3.CENTRO_DE_COSTOSVALUE, T3.DEPARTAMENTOVALUE, T2.TXT, T2.OFFSETTXT, (T2.AMOUNTCURDEBIT * T2.EXCHRATE)/100 AS AMOUNTCURDEBIT, (T2.AMOUNTCURCREDIT * T2.EXCHRATE)/100 AS AMOUNTCURCREDIT From Warehouse.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL T1 INNER JOIN Warehouse.LEDGERJOURNALTRANS T2 ON T1.JOURNALNUMBER = T2.JOURNALNUM LEFT JOIN Warehouse.DimensionAttributeValueCombination T3 ON T3.RECID = T1.RECID AND T2.COMPANY = 'LOG' AND T2.Zap_CreatedTime BETWEEN '20221001 00:00:00' AND '20221018 23:59:59'
